gov.usgs.volcanoes.winston.legacyServer.cmd.http

Class AbstractHttpCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.volcanoes.winston.legacyServer.cmd.http.AbstractHttpCommand
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FdsnCommand, HttpGapsCommand, HttpHeliCommand, HttpMenuCommand, HttpRsamCommand, HttpStatusCommand

    public abstract class AbstractHttpCommand
extends Object
    All possible HTTP commands are expected to extend this class. When a new class is created, it must be added to HttpGetCommand
    Author:
    Tom Parker
